data.question: What is the molecular formula of compound 3?
What type of geometry do the silver ions in complex 3 adopt?
Is the void of the metal-containing cage 3 occupied by a methyl group of an acetonitrile?
What is the yield of oxacalix[2]arene[2]pyrazine (2) synthesis?
Does the 1H NMR spectrum of complex 4 in CD3NO2 show significant broadening of pyrazinyl H2 and H6 signals?
What is the space group of complex 4?
Can the discrete molecular cage 3 survive in coordinating solvents like DMSO?
What is the role of AgBF4 in the synthesis of complex 3?
data.answer: It acts as a silver cation source for coordination-driven self-assembly.

data.question: Is the dihedral angle between two pyrazine rings in the cyclophane of complex 3 larger than in the free ligand?
What solvent combination is used for the synthesis of complex 4?
Does complex 4 form a one-dimensional chain of coordination cages?
What is the coordination geometry of the silver ions in complex 4?
Is the void of each cage in complex 4 occupied by one benzene ring?
What is the purpose of using DMSO in the synthesis of oxacalix[2]arene[2]pyrazine (2)?
data.answer: DMSO is used as a solvent for the reaction.

data.question: Are the BF4- anions positioned outside the cage in complex 3?
What is the result of the ESI-MS analysis for complex 3 in acetonitrile?
data.answer: It demonstrates the presence of 1:1 complexes [Ag(1)]1+.

data.question: Does the synthesis of complex 3 require heating?
What is the effect of the coordination geometry on the dihedral angle between pyrazine rings in complex 4?
data.answer: The dihedral angle is changed to accommodate the square-planar coordination geometry of Ag+.

data.question: Is the yield of ortho-linked oxacalix[2]arene[2]pyrazine (1) synthesis higher than 50%?
What is the role of Cs2CO3 in the synthesis of oxacalix[2]arene[2]pyrazine (2)?
